mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.dwmc dwmc, t.dwlb dwlb, TO_CHAR(t.dwclsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') dwclsj, t.dwdz dwdz, t.dzlj dzlj, t.dzh dzh, t.dwgk dwgk, t.xzqh xzqh, t.zbdh zbdh, t.yzbm yzbm, t.dzyx dzyx, t.gdzc gdzc, t.zgrs zgrs, t.fhdj fhdj, t.fhdzid fhdzid, t.fhdzmc fhdzmc, t.mhdzid mhdzid, t.mhdzmc mhdzmc, t.xfzrr xfzrr, t.xfzrrsfz xfzrrsfz, t.xfzrrdh xfzrrdh, t.xfglr xfglr, t.xfglrsfz xfglrsfz, t.xfglrdh xfglrdh, t.xfdwlx xfdwlx, t.xfdwrs xfdwrs, t.xfdwcls xfdwcls, t.xfdwlxr xfdwlxr, t.xfdwdh xfdwdh, t.xfdwbz xfdwbz, t.xfsssl xfsssl, t.jzfl jzfl, t.jzsl jzsl, t.zdmj zdmj, t.jzmj jzmj, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.blgxd blgxd, t.blgxn blgxn, t.blgxx blgxx, t.blgxb blgxb, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME dwlbmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.CODE_NAME jzflmc, c8.CODE_NAME fhdjmc, c9.DZMC mhdzidmc, CASE xfdwlx WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' END AS xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDDWLB' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWLB = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.JZFL = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.FHDJ = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.DZBM AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and rownum <= 100

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME dwlbmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.CODE_NAME jzflmc, c8.CODE_NAME fhdjmc, c9.DZMC mhdzidmc, CASE xfdwlx WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' END AS xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDDWLB' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWLB = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.JZFL = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.FHDJ = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.DZBM AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value} and rownum <= 100
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW(uuid,dwmc,dwlb,dwclsj,dwdz,dzlj,dzh,dwgk,xzqh,zbdh,yzbm,dzyx,gdzc,zgrs,fhdj,fhdzid,fhdzmc,mhdzid,mhdzmc,xfzrr,xfzrrsfz,xfzrrdh,xfglr,xfglrsfz,xfglrdh,xfdwlx,xfdwrs,xfdwcls,xfdwlxr,xfdwdh,xfdwbz,xfsssl,jzfl,jzsl,zdmj,jzmj,gis_x,gis_y,lon,lat,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwclsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{dwdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gdzc,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zgrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{fhdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfzrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfzrrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfzrrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfglr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfglrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfglrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfdwcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfdwlxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfsssl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW(uuid,dwmc,dwlb,dwclsj,dwdz,dzlj,dzh,dwgk,xzqh,zbdh,yzbm,dzyx,gdzc,zgrs,fhdj,fhdzid,fhdzmc,mhdzid,mhdzmc,xfzrr,xfzrrsfz,xfzrrdh,xfglr,xfglrsfz,xfglrdh,xfdwlx,xfdwrs,xfdwcls,xfdwlxr,xfdwdh,xfdwbz,xfsssl,jzfl,jzsl,zdmj,jzmj,gis_x,gis_y,lon,lat,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwmc,#{item.dwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwlb,#{item.dwclsj,jdbcType=DATE} dwclsj,#{item.dwdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwdz,#{item.dzlj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlj,#{item.dzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzh,#{item.dwgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwgk,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.zbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbdh,#{item.yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yzbm,#{item.dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzyx,#{item.gdzc,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gdzc,#{item.zgrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zgrs,#{item.fhdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdj,#{item.fhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdzid,#{item.fhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdzmc,#{item.mhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mhdzid,#{item.mhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mhdzmc,#{item.xfzrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrr,#{item.xfzrrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrrsfz,#{item.xfzrrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrrdh,#{item.xfglr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglr,#{item.xfglrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglrsfz,#{item.xfglrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglrdh,#{item.xfdwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwlx,#{item.xfdwrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfdwrs,#{item.xfdwcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfdwcls,#{item.xfdwlxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwlxr,#{item.xfdwdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwdh,#{item.xfdwbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwbz,#{item.xfsssl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfsssl,#{item.jzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzfl,#{item.jzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jzsl,#{item.zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zdmj,#{item.jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jzmj,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y,#{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lon,#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lat,#{item.blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxd,#{item.blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxn,#{item.blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxx,#{item.blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxb,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), dwmc = VALUES(dwmc), dwlb = VALUES(dwlb), dwclsj = VALUES(dwclsj), dwdz = VALUES(dwdz), dzlj = VALUES(dzlj), dzh = VALUES(dzh), dwgk = VALUES(dwgk), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), zbdh = VALUES(zbdh), yzbm = VALUES(yzbm), dzyx = VALUES(dzyx), gdzc = VALUES(gdzc), zgrs = VALUES(zgrs), fhdj = VALUES(fhdj), fhdzid = VALUES(fhdzid), fhdzmc = VALUES(fhdzmc), mhdzid = VALUES(mhdzid), mhdzmc = VALUES(mhdzmc), xfzrr = VALUES(xfzrr), xfzrrsfz = VALUES(xfzrrsfz), xfzrrdh = VALUES(xfzrrdh), xfglr = VALUES(xfglr), xfglrsfz = VALUES(xfglrsfz), xfglrdh = VALUES(xfglrdh), xfdwlx = VALUES(xfdwlx), xfdwrs = VALUES(xfdwrs), xfdwcls = VALUES(xfdwcls), xfdwlxr = VALUES(xfdwlxr), xfdwdh = VALUES(xfdwdh), xfdwbz = VALUES(xfdwbz), xfsssl = VALUES(xfsssl), jzfl = VALUES(jzfl), jzsl = VALUES(jzsl), zdmj = VALUES(zdmj), jzmj = VALUES(jzmj), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y), lon = VALUES(lon), lat = VALUES(lat), blgxd = VALUES(blgxd), blgxn = VALUES(blgxn), blgxx = VALUES(blgxx), blgxb = VALUES(blgxb), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME dwlbmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.CODE_NAME jzflmc, c8.CODE_NAME fhdjmc, c9.DZMC mhdzidmc, CASE xfdwlx WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' END AS xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDDWLB' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWLB = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.JZFL = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.FHDJ = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.DZBM AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and rownum <= 100
